WorkItem.Description:
When trying to access the Task.Definition property, I get a COMException.

I'm running Windows 10 Build 15063 x64. The process is running with Admin rights

Comments.Message: Will you provide the settings you have applied to it if this is one you've created? If this is a task that already exists, please send me the XML for that task by attaching it here.
Also, please make sure you are running the latest version (2.5.26) as there was a similar problem in version 2.5.22 and earlier.
